amendment.description: To permit Jackson Hole Airport to adopt certain noise reduction measures.

vote.text: Amendment SA 913 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 913 proposed by Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S7805; text: CR S7805) To permit Jackson Hole Airport to adopt certain noise reduction measures.
